name: ❂ Hexaluga ❂ Weapon and Shield ☯
description: Help the Weapon of War get over all the obstacles and return to its master, the Father of War. How long will it take you?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2GHz Duo Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Default
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 or higher with 2GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Default
